00019 template <class T> unsigned int Node<T>::hasChildNode(T value)
00020 {
00021         // check T, caus for T = NodeOfTrees* we don't want to compare the pointers, but the objects
00022         if ( (string)typeid(value).name() == "P11NodeOfTrees")
00023         {
00024                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00025                 {
00026                         if (*(NodeOfTrees*)childNodes[i]->value == *(NodeOfTrees*)value)
00027                                 return i;
00028                 }
00029         }
00030         else
00031         {
00032                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00033                 {
00034                          if (childNodes[i]->value == value)
00035                                 return i;
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 
00039         // we did not found a node with the given value -> throw nodeDoesNotOccur exception
00040         throw (bool)1;
00041 }
00042 
00043 template <class T> Node<T>* Node<T>::insertChildNode(T value)
00044 {
00045         unsigned int pos;
00046         // search if a Node with the word already exists in childNodes (if there is one -> get its position)
00047         try 
00048         {
00049                 pos = this->hasChildNode(value);
00050         }
00051         catch (bool nodeDoesNotOccur)
00052         {
00053                 // node does not exist yet -> create it and return the new node
00054                 childNodes.push_back(new Node<T>(value));
00055                 return childNodes[childNodes.size()-1];
00056         }
00057         // node with the given value already exists -> increment count and return the node
00058         childNodes[pos]->count++;
00059         return childNodes[pos];
00060 }

00072 template <class T> Node<T>* Tree<T>::insert(vector<T> &values)
00073 {
00074         Node<T>* n = root;
00075         for (unsigned int i=0; i<values.size(); i++)
00076         {
00077                 n = n->insertChildNode(values[i]);
00078         }
00079         return n;
00080 }

00082 template <class T> void Tree<T>::insert(PhrasePair* p)
00083 {
00084         // transform src-words into src-NodeOfTrees
00085         vector<NodeOfTrees*> src;
00086         src.resize(p->src.size());
00087         for (unsigned int i=0; i<p->src.size(); i++)
00088         {
00089                 src[i] = new NodeOfTrees(p->src[i], new Tree<unsigned int>(0));
00090         }
00091 
00092         // insert/increment src-path
00093         Node<T>* lastNode = this->insert(src);
00094 
00095         // concat target-path to the src-paths-last-node
00096         lastNode->value->tree->insert(p->target);
00097 }

00099 template <class T> unsigned int Tree<T>::getCount(vector<T> &phrase)
00100 {
00101         Node<T>* n = root;
00102         for (unsigned int i=0; i<phrase.size(); i++)
00103         {
00104                 for (unsigned int j=0; j<n->childNodes.size(); j++)
00105                 {
00106                         if (n->childNodes[j]->value == phrase[i])
00107                         {
00108                                 n = n->childNodes[j];
00109                                 break;
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112         }
00113 
00114         return n->count;
00115 }
